## UnicodeUtils.getDirection() function

Returns the Unicode's character direction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function getDirection(codePoint: number, block: string): Direction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  codePoint | number | Character's Unicode code point. |
|  block | string | Character's Unicode block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Direction](./harp-text-canvas.unicodeutils.direction.md)

Character's direction.
